title: A Jordan Peterson Jungian Boyo talks Satan and Progress with a JBP Pentecostal
description:
Kevin who I spoke with not long ago had a theological dispute with Steafon Fox over the devil. Steafon is part of the Boyos who talk Carl Jung, Jordan Peterson and Nietzsche over on their channel. We had little time and a confusion over scheduling but what came out was a sort of a while free-for-all conversation about Christian formation, notions of progress, Satan, antiquity, the Metadivine realm, God, predestination, you name it. It starts slow but be patient with it. 

My talk with Kevin https://youtu.be/mJW5AmyOeW4
My talk with the Boyos https://youtu.be/F1jZJtwb9TU
Boyos Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCrk8Y2fsR5i_5c1iTR9tZpg
My video on the Metadivine Realm https://youtu.be/nsQWCZFmRx0
Christine Hayes Yale Course https://youtu.be/wRPqtGywkCw
The Religion of Israel https://amzn.to/2s4Sps2
The evolution of a music genre

Nietzsche, pull out the metaphysic and all that will remain will be the instincts

Pentecostals

You’re always proposing a theory of evil
There’s always an archetype

Pentecostals
Amish
Silicon Valley

Progressivism
Thesis of Evil

Lucifer, Satan
Universal description of temptation
Adversary
15th century Modernity, 
Satan of profound arrogance
Milton
Protestant Reformation
Caste system
Destroy the church, establish a new order

Luddites
